item.title: Asymptotics of Alpha-Divergence Variational Inference Algorithms with Exponential Families
item.description: This paper rigorously analyzes alpha-divergence variational inference, proving its convergence and providing convergence rates, thereby advancing the theoretical foundations of this increasingly impor…
